name: Relentless Slayer
text: Many avengers find themselves confronting some great threat, such as a group of drow seeking to enslave a surface kingdom, an incursion of demons, a cult of Tharizdun worshipers, or an empire of vampires secretly ruling over human cities. Whatever the threat might be, it is dire enough to drive you to an old and powerful rite of sacred commitment. Through prayerful vigils, you have invested your oath of enmity with tremendous potency. All avengers rely on oath of enmity, but you draw on yours to perform exceptional feats in battle.

features.lethalAction(11thLevel): If you spend an action point to make an attack against your oath of enmity target, the attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20
features.slayer'sOath(11thLevel): Whenever you use oath of enmity, you can target a second enemy with it if that enemy is your slayer’s enemy (see the sidebar)
features.relentlessDetermination(16thLevel): When you fail a saving throw against an effect caused by an enemy, your divine attack powers deal 5 extra damage until the end of your next turn

flavorText: I am the bane of your kind.
